channel.title: Changing stats?
channel.description:
ok so i don't have to explain it ill just show a pic of what i want... this is my stats when a person gets maxed out all 99s... [img]http://img329.imageshack.us/img329/4517/stats1go7.png[/img]
this is what i want the stats to be when a person gets maxed out... (hp higher than the rest) [img]http://img329.imageshack.us/img329/609/stats2em3.png[/img]
how can i make this happen? client side? sever side? anyone know anything that may help?
